creditline: Gift of Gerald Ray Nelson and Joanne Hogan Nelson
description: silhouette of an old man with a long beard, wearing a cap with a long tassel, sitting on a bench under a bare tree, leaning on a cane; cottage, farm field and trees in background
inscription:
Signature and Inscription

LRC, in pencil: [6 7/8 x 7 3/8 in.]; on back, in pencil: [37410] and [From The Beard Art Galleries / Minneapolis, Minnesota]
provenance: The artist; his stepdaughter, Joanie Nelson, Vancouver, WA
signed: LRC, in black: [R / H]; on back, in pencil: [Richard Holzschuh]
title: Thinker
